alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ascension; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. John The Baptist, northeastern Ascension, northeastern St. James and southern Livingston Parishes through 415 PM CDT... At 324 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near French Settlement, or 9 miles east of Gonzales, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laplace, Reserve, Sorrento, French Settlement, Port Vincent, Whitehall and Killian. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 188 and 192, and between mile markers 200 and 207. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Ascension; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist
